page.title: 12Going Shopping
page.content:
I go shopping to Telford sometimes.But normally I go to Madeley.Madeley has got lots of shops but it hasn't got a roof.I like to go shopping everywhere. Madeley has got a library and food shops and a post_office and lots of other things.I like Madeley best but only when it is market day.It smells of dogs and it is very nasty.
I go shopping at Telford Town Centre. There are lots of shops there.There are clothes shops and toy shops.There are Banks to put your money in.You get meat from the butchers and cameras from Debenhams and there are three car parks,one at the front,one at the side and one at the back.I don't like shopping because it is boring.You hear babies cry and trolleys rattling and people talking.
